text: Henriette Martinez (born July 10, 1949 in Laragne-Montéglin, Hautes-Alpes) was a member of the National Assembly of France. She represented Hautes-Alpes' 1st constituency, as a member of the Rally for the Republic from 1993 to 1997 and again as a member of Union for a Popular Movement from 2002 to 2012. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:People from Hautes-Alpes Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Popular Right Category:Mayors of places in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Category:Women mayors of places in France Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Henriette Martinez
